name: graph-tool
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'if ! command -v quarto &> /dev/null; then curl -L https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/releases/latest/download/quarto-linux-amd64.tar.gz | tar -xz -C /tmp && mv /tmp/quarto-*/bin/quarto /usr/local/bin/ && rm -rf /tmp/quarto-* && echo "Quarto installed successfully"; else echo "Quarto already installed"; fi'
